links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..40
formula: Stirling-Bernoulli transform sends a to b where b(n) = Sum_{i=0..n} (-1)^i*i!*S(n+1, i+1)*b(i).
maple: with(combinat):a:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n<1, 1,      add((-1)^k*k!*stirling2(n, k+1)*a(k), k=0..n-1))    end:seq(a(n), n=0..15);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 17 2013
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 09 2000
